title: free utilities included with apartment, bad credit okay
posting_body: ['Twain Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Walk to Las Vegas Strip', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Easy freeway access', '-Close to UNLV', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
